channel.title: googleDirections plugin Tutorial 02: Specifying Stopover Points
channel.description: Discuss googleDirections plugin Tutorial 02: Specifying Stopover Points

item.title: François says:
item.description: Hi KKSOU Thanx to take time to answer us. For information, the following code, to add to the command line as a parameter will fit this need : hide_direction_text=1 Perhaps you already gave it to me some time ago.... Kind regards François
item.dc:creator: François

item.title: kksou says:
item.description: Hi François, The entire maps and direction is actually written directly by Google i.e. the plugin does not get to process the data at all. I'm not sure if the Google Map API provide such a function that displays the waypoints but suppress the direction. If you or anyone know the part of the GoogleMaps API that allows this, do let me know and I can add that in for you. Warm Regards, /kksou
item.dc:creator: kksou

item.title: François says:
item.description: I'd like to no display the directions, neither at left, nor at right or below... How to please ?? Regards and thanx
item.dc:creator: François
